name: 10 Second Village
description:
10 Second Village

A small, puzzle village builder where a day passes Every 10 Seconds.

Place world tiles and manage a constantly changing environment.

How To Play

Keep your population alive as long as you can. The game ends when your population reaches 0.

Main Tiles

Farms Produce Wheat (Must be placed next to water)

Houses Produce People

Forests Produce Wood

Quarries Produce Stone

Weather Tiles

Hot Sun Removes Flooding

Rain Removes Fires

Keyboard:

  1. Movement - WASD or Arrow Keys
  2. Place / Interact - Spacebar
  3. Rotate Tile - Q and E
  4. Toggle Tile Shop - Tab

Controller (Xbox):

  1. Movement - Left Stick
  2. Place / Interact - A
  3. Rotate Tile - Left and Right Bumpers
  4. Toggle Tile Shop - Y

Twitter: @DeveloperTom1

Website/Blog: https://www.tomstephensondeveloper.co.uk/

This game was created for the Ludum Dare 51 event in 72 hours.
